text:
The buffer for BodyContentImpl does not appear to be properly bounds checked. If
sufficient data is buffered, an ArrayOutOfBoundsException is thrown by the
String.getChars() method in write(String, int , int) (line 183). By increasing
the buffer size multiple (line 114):

int newBufferSize = bufferSize * 4;

The problem is resolved. However, the possibility for future buffer overflow
remains.
creator: ricardo.gladwell@ubqtmedia.com

text:
This has been resolved AFAIK, we reallocate to make space for len chars - 
if you get a overflow in the latest build please send a test case.
